pages.title: Gold Ore
pages.text: Gold ore can be found at Y32 and bellow in the Atum dimension only.

pages.title: Diamond Ore
pages.text: Diamond ore can be found at Y16 and bellow in the Atum dimension only.

pages.title: Nebu Ore
pages.text: Nebu ore can be found at Y64 and bellow in the Atum dimension only.

pages.title: Relic Ore
pages.text: Relic ore can be found at Y64 and bellow in the Atum dimension only.
